name: CloseBot
description: AI appointment setter that integrates with GoHighLevel. Qualifies leads, books meetings, handles multi-channel conversations 24/7. The #1 choice for GHL agencies.
longDescription: CloseBot is an AI-powered appointment setter that automates lead qualification and booking. It integrates natively with GoHighLevel, HubSpot, and other CRMs. Unlike simple chatbots, CloseBot uses advanced conversational AI to have natural, multi-turn conversations with prospectsâ€”understanding context, answering questions, and booking meetings directly into your calendar. For agencies, it's white-label ready with a branded client portal.
pricingDetails: 14-day free trial. Plans from $99/mo (Starter) to $299/mo (Pro). Enterprise custom pricing.

name: ChatBase
description: Upload your docs, train it in 5 minutes, and your clients get instant answers. No coding. No headaches.
longDescription:
Look, if you need a chatbot that actually works, this is it. Upload your docs, train it in 5 minutes, and your clients get instant answers. No coding required, and the setup is stupid simple â€” even your least tech-savvy client can handle it.

Thing is, most chatbots feel robotic. This one doesn't. Your clients won't know it's AI â€” they'll just think you hired someone brilliant to answer questions 24/7.

White-label option means you slap your branding on it and charge whatever you want. I've seen agencies charging $500-$1,500/month for this. Starts at $19/month for you.
pricingDetails: Free tier available. Paid plans from $19/mo to $99/mo
features: Train on your content in minutes

name: Listkit.io
description: Build targeted lead lists fast. Listkit finds verified emails, phone numbers, and company data so you can start outreach immediately.
longDescription:
Most lead gen tools give you garbage data. Listkit doesn't. It pulls from multiple verified sources and gives you clean, accurate contact info - emails, phone numbers, company details, everything you need.

What makes it different? The data is actually verified. You're not wasting time on bounced emails or disconnected numbers. Plus, the interface is dead simple - search, filter, export. No learning curve.

Perfect for agencies doing cold outreach or building prospect lists for clients. Starts at $49/month, way cheaper than Apollo or ZoomInfo.
